page.title: 05Children's Games Class 5
page.content: The favourite game in our school is tig of which there are many forms. Some of these are circle, chain and bulldogs. In circle you can stand in one of the painted circles on the yard for a count of ten without being tug. When you have been caught three times you are on.In chain tig you join hands until there are four of you and then split into two. In bulldogs you try to run across the yard and if tug you join the ones who are on. Skipping and jumping in and out of a loop of elastic to songs are popular with the girls. We like snakes and ladders, chess, cluedo, draughts, battle-ships, snap and card games. Rounders is the most popular team game. Releasio is a form of hide and seek but when seen you race to the post to free ones who have been caught.
